summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UNIFY University Admin pages (Iteration 4). All 10 features tested and working: University Admin Login, Dashboard, Departments CRUD, Courses CRUD, Sessions CRUD, Staff Management, Registration Config, Question Bank, Payments (MOCK data), and Settings (3 tabs). Backend: 27/27 tests passed. Frontend: All pages load correctly with proper CRUD operations.
passed_tests: University Admin Login - Success with Person ID and Password
University Admin Login - Rejects wrong password
University Admin Login - Rejects wrong person ID
University Dashboard - Shows stats (leads, applications, staff)
Departments - List departments API
Departments - Create department API
Departments - Update department API
Departments - UI page loads with table
Departments - Add Department dialog works
Courses - List courses API
Courses - Create course API
Courses - Update course API
Courses - UI page loads with table and department filter
Courses - Add Course dialog works
Sessions - List sessions API
Sessions - Create session API
Sessions - UI page loads with session cards
Sessions - Add Session dialog works
Staff Management - List staff API
Staff Management - Create counsellor API
Staff Management - Create counselling manager API
Staff Management - Invalid role rejected
Staff Management - UI page loads with tabs and table
Staff Management - Add Staff dialog works
Question Bank - List questions API
Question Bank - Create single choice question API
Question Bank - Create multiple choice question API
Question Bank - UI page loads with stats and table
Question Bank - Add Question dialog works
University Payments - UI page loads with stats and table (MOCK data)
University Settings - General tab loads with university info
University Settings - Payment tab loads with Razorpay config
University Settings - Notifications tab loads with toggles
Registration Config - UI page loads with workflow steps
Registration Config - Update config API
API Authentication - All endpoints require auth
critical_code_review_comments: All 6 new university pages (DepartmentsPage, CoursesPage, SessionsPage, QuestionBankPage, UniversityPaymentsPage, UniversitySettingsPage) are properly implemented
All pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
CRUD operations work correctly for Departments, Courses, Sessions, Staff, Questions
Form validation working on both frontend and backend
UniversityPaymentsPage uses MOCK data as expected (noted in review request)
seed_data_creation: Created test departments, courses, sessions, staff, and questions during backend testing

mocked_apis.note: UniversityPaymentsPage uses MOCK payment data for display as mentioned in review request

context_for_next_testing_agent: All University Admin pages tested and working in iteration 4. Backend has 27 passing tests in /app/tests/test_university_admin_iteration4.py. Pages tested: Dashboard, Departments, Courses, Sessions, Staff, Registration Config, Question Bank, Payments (mock), Settings (3 tabs). Login flow: Select University -> Select Role (University Admin) -> Enter Person ID (ADMIN001) -> Enter Password (admin123456) -> Sign In.
